item.title: Playing fetch (almost)
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Ouzo has yet to teach her to throw the ball, but he's getting close... http://www.youtube.com/v/ADRNPxiuZUM She often stands on her own, although I don't think she realizes she's doing it on her own. She can generally get anywhere in the house, even climb a few stairs. But she still thinks she needs to hold your hands to really get going.
